Name: dt_create
Description: Creates a date object from the specified year, month, day, and optionally time components.

Arguments.Description: Arguments list: [yyyy, MM, dd, hh, mm, ss]
A single numeric parameter in the list.

Name: dt_now
Description: Gets the current date and time.

Name: dt_today
Description: Gets the current date with time set to midnight (00:00:00).

Name: dt_dayofyear
Description: Gets the day of the year (1-366) for the specified date.

Arguments.Description: Date for which the day of the year is calculated.

Name: dt_dayofweek
Description: Gets the day of the week (0-6, where 0 is Sunday) for the specified date.

Arguments.Description: Date for which the day of the week is calculated.

Name: dt_year
Description: Gets the year component of the specified date.

Arguments.Description: Date for which the year is retrieved.

Name: dt_month
Description: Gets the month component (1-12) of the specified date.

Arguments.Description: Date for which the month is retrieved.

Name: dt_day
Description: Gets the day of the month (1-31) of the specified date.

Arguments.Description: Date for which the day of the month is retrieved.

Name: dt_hour
Description: Gets the hour component (0-23) of the specified date.

Arguments.Description: Date for which the hour is retrieved.

Name: dt_minute
Description: Gets the minute component (0-59) of the specified date.

Arguments.Description: Date for which the minute is retrieved.

Name: dt_second
Description: Gets the second component (0-59) of the specified date.

Arguments.Description: Date for which the second is retrieved.

Name: dt_add
Description: Adds a specified interval string (e.g., '1y', '2m', '-16d') to a date.

Arguments.Description: Date to which interval is added.
Interval string (e.g., '1y', '2m', '-5d').

Name: dt_addyears
Description: Adds the specified number of years to the given date.

Arguments.Description: Date to which years are added.
Number of years to add.

Name: dt_addmonths
Description: Adds the specified number of months to the given date.

Arguments.Description: Date to which months are added.
Number of months to add.

Name: dt_adddays
Description: Adds the specified number of days to the given date.

Arguments.Description: Date to which days are added.
Number of days to add.

Name: dt_addhours
Description: Adds the specified number of hours to the given date.

Arguments.Description: Date to which hours are added.
Number of hours to add.

Name: dt_addminutes
Description: Adds the specified number of minutes to the given date.

Arguments.Description: Date to which minutes are added.
Number of minutes to add.

Name: dt_addseconds
Description: Adds the specified number of seconds to the given date.

Arguments.Description: Date to which seconds are added.
Number of seconds to add.

Name: dt_before
Description: Checks if the first date represents a time strictly before the second date.

Arguments.Description: The date to check.
The comparison reference date.

Name: dt_after
Description: Checks if the first date represents a time strictly after the second date.

Arguments.Description: The date to check.
The comparison reference date.

Name: dt_equal
Description: Checks if the first date represents the exact same time as the second date.

Arguments.Description: The date to check.
The comparison reference date.

Name: dt_before_equal
Description: Checks if the first date is before or equal to the second date.

Arguments.Description: The date to check.
The comparison reference date.

Name: dt_after_equal
Description: Checks if the first date is after or equal to the second date.

Arguments.Description: The date to check.
The comparison reference date.

Name: dt_all
Description: Checks if all provided arguments are valid date values.

Arguments.Description: A list of arguments to check for date validity.
A value to check.
